title: WTT: Walsh EPDG or Hindu for Mathewson Portrait
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: WTT: Walsh EPDG or Hindu for Mathewson Portrait
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I’d like to trade either a PSA 4 EPDG or PSA 3.5 Hindu Walsh for a low- to mid-grade Mathewson portrait. These have been in my collection for some time and were part of a back run I had completed. Please email me at [url]jennings.eric@gmail.com[/url] if interested and would like to discuss. NO LONGER AVAILABLE 

Thanks,
Eric
Just want to say Eric is a pleasure to work with and one of the nicest members on the board. Good luck buddy!
Josh, thanks for the kind words…September bump

I have traded many times with Eric- good guy and great for the hobby 

CT
